ing: 1/2 honeydew melon, peeled and finely diced
des: "This salsa recipe uses an unusual combination of ingredients - melons, onions, jalapenos, etc.  It's a wonderful item to serve at parties as a dip with your favorite taco chips.  Also great when eaten with fish, or even as a topping to a salad."
ins: In a large serving bowl, stir together the tomatoes, honeydew melon, cantaloupe, red onion, jalapeno and cilantro. Stir in the orange juice, almonds, salt and lime juice. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving for best flavor.
